languages.text: {n}Соломон принимает смерть без единого звука, с кривой усмешкой на лице. Глейто даже не оскаливается — он просто замирает у тела хозяина. Из швов на собачьей голове медленно выступают капли крови.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
Игрок убивает компаньона
на собаку повесить Solomorne_Dead_Bark (f8a65338e1b4dad46bd4f41b1ee451d2)

Игрок убивает компаньона
на собаку повесить Solomorne_Dead_Bark (f8a65338e1b4dad46bd4f41b1ee451d2)

languages.text: {n}Solomorne accepts his death without a single sound, wearing a crooked smile on his face. Glaito does not even snarl, but simply goes still at his master's feet. Drops of blood slowly seep from the stitches on the dog's head.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон принимает смерть без единого звука, с кривой усмешкой на лице. Глейто даже не оскаливается — он просто замирает у тела хозяина. Из швов на собачьей голове медленно выступают капли крови.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは顔にゆがんだ笑みを浮かべたまま、一言も発することなく死を受け入れた。グライトはうなり声を上げることすらせず、主人の足元でじっと動かなくなった。犬の頭部の縫い目からは、血の雫がゆっくりと滲み出していった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne accepts his death without a single sound, wearing a crooked smile on his face. Glaito does not even snarl, but simply goes still at his master's feet. Drops of blood slowly seep from the stitches on the dog's head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは顔にゆがんだ笑みを浮かべたまま、一言も発することなく死を受け入れた。グライトはうなり声を上げることすらせず、主人の足元でじっと動かなくなった。犬の頭部の縫い目からは、血の雫がゆっくりと滲み出していった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne nimmt seinen Tod ohne ein einziges Geräusch hin, auf seinem Gesicht liegt ein schiefes Lächeln. Glaito knurrt nicht einmal, sondern hört zu den Füßen seines Herren einfach auf, sich zu bewegen. Aus den Nähten am Kopf des Hundes rinnen langsam einzelne Blutstropfen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne accepts his death without a single sound, wearing a crooked smile on his face. Glaito does not even snarl, but simply goes still at his master's feet. Drops of blood slowly seep from the stitches on the dog's head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne nimmt seinen Tod ohne ein einziges Geräusch hin, auf seinem Gesicht liegt ein schiefes Lächeln. Glaito knurrt nicht einmal, sondern hört zu den Füßen seines Herren einfach auf, sich zu bewegen. Aus den Nähten am Kopf des Hundes rinnen langsam einzelne Blutstropfen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Silencieux, Solomorme accepte votre verdict d'un sourire amer. Glaito ne grogne pas non plus et va simplement se placer aux pieds de son maître. Des gouttes de sang perlent des sutures qui ornent sa tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne accepts his death without a single sound, wearing a crooked smile on his face. Glaito does not even snarl, but simply goes still at his master's feet. Drops of blood slowly seep from the stitches on the dog's head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Silencieux, Solomorme accepte votre verdict d'un sourire amer. Glaito ne grogne pas non plus et va simplement se placer aux pieds de son maître. Des gouttes de sang perlent des sutures qui ornent sa tête.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne acepta su muerte con una sonrisa de soslayo y sin hacer un solo ruido. Glaito ni siquiera gruñe; se limita a permanecer muy quieto a los pies de su amo. Unas gotas de sangre manan lentamente de las suturas que tiene en la cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne accepts his death without a single sound, wearing a crooked smile on his face. Glaito does not even snarl, but simply goes still at his master's feet. Drops of blood slowly seep from the stitches on the dog's head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne acepta su muerte con una sonrisa de soslayo y sin hacer un solo ruido. Glaito ni siquiera gruñe; se limita a permanecer muy quieto a los pies de su amo. Unas gotas de sangre manan lentamente de las suturas que tiene en la cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙脸上带着扭曲的笑容，一言不发，默默接受了他的死刑。格雷托连叫都没叫，仅仅是静静地躺在主人的脚下。随后，鲜血从格雷托头上的缝线处慢慢渗了出来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne accepts his death without a single sound, wearing a crooked smile on his face. Glaito does not even snarl, but simply goes still at his master's feet. Drops of blood slowly seep from the stitches on the dog's head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙脸上带着扭曲的笑容，一言不发，默默接受了他的死刑。格雷托连叫都没叫，仅仅是静静地躺在主人的脚下。随后，鲜血从格雷托头上的缝线处慢慢渗了出来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne; tek bir çıt dahi çıkarmadan, yüzünde çarpık bir gülümsemeyle ölümünü kabulleniyor. Glaito da aynı şekilde hırlamıyor bile ancak sakince efendisinin yanı başına çekiliyor. Dikişlerden akan kanlar, yavaşça köpeğin kafasına damlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne accepts his death without a single sound, wearing a crooked smile on his face. Glaito does not even snarl, but simply goes still at his master's feet. Drops of blood slowly seep from the stitches on the dog's head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne tek bir çıt dahi çıkarmadan, yüzünde çarpık bir gülümsemeyle ölümünü kabullenir. Glaito da aynı şekilde hırlamaz bile ancak sakince efendisinin yanı başına gider. Dikişlerden akan kanlar yavaşça köpeğin kafasına damlar.{/n}
